chunk:
Elina Organics Botanical Toner

Brand: Elina Organics

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: Distilled Water, (Rosa Damascena) Rose Distillate, Fulvic Acid, Trifolium Pratense (Red Clover) Extract, Salix Nigra (Black Willow Bark) Extract.

Directions: After cleansing, mist over your face and neck until saturated. Follow with serums/elixirs and moisturizer. This product is especially beneficial for those with dry, sensitive, or mature skin.

Ingredient concerns: LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
